# OpenPlan3D

> Free, open-source 2D & 3D floor plan editor that runs in your browser.

## What it does
- Draw floor plans in 2D with walls, doors, windows, and dimensions
- Visualize designs in real-time 3D
- Place 140+ furniture models from a built-in library
- Import Apple RoomPlan scans (iPhone/iPad LiDAR)
- Import 3D mesh models (GLB/glTF)
- Export to PNG, SVG, DXF, PDF, JSON
- Imperial and metric unit support

## Key facts
- Completely free â€” no premium tier, no paywalls, no signup required
- Open source: https://github.com/theLodgeBots/open3dFloorplan
- Web app: https://app.openplan3d.com
- Built with SvelteKit and Three.js

## Links
- Website: https://www.openplan3d.com
- Editor: https://app.openplan3d.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/theLodgeBots/open3dFloorplan
